Reviews.Title: Horrible web browser!!
Reviews.Author: T    PETERS
Reviews.Content: If you want to web  search w/this phone , get ready for lots and  lots  of "Connection Interrupted" messages while web surfing.  Very often, my sister would web surf w/her v. mobile phone  (at the same time)  & connect to the exact page I was unable to get, using my "Kona" phone. For web surfing - it's a piece of crap !!

Reviews.Title: FROZEN PHONE
Reviews.Author: M. S. Pryor
Reviews.Content: worked great for 3 weeks but now it is frozen - will not turn on or off , cannot do anything with it

ProductInfo.Name: Kyocera Kona S2151 Prepaid Flip Phone - payLo by Virgin Mobile
